about_the_game:
We're Getting Deeper Into The Abyss is an open world 2.5D experience that focuses on mental health and isolation, using the beautiful tone of music, all while the world changes over time. Players will be able to follow the journey of the main character, Frei Kay, and his mysterious power of his "music."

Follow along the story while you, the player, can explore around a small open world, with interactions with the public, and don't worry, they all live their lives and won't get in their way. Unless, they decide to toss some mischief at you, last second. The town has side stories that end in their own and unique way. Watch as our main character, Frei, develops.

Frei, an inspiring musical artist. Who tends to think about the little things a bit too much. Others consider him a gentle soul, while he would consider himself quite different. He'd describe himself as timid, though people see him always throwing himself into situations to please others. Being a known fellow around town, his goal was always to spread his musical tone.

If people aren't aware of him, they'd only question his appearance. Always keeping his guitar around, and a spare notepad. Never leaving home without it. Those were his two best friends, if anything. Guitary & Notepaddy. He tends to write down a lot of things that inspire him, such as dumb lines in conversations that might seem deep. In reality, they only seem good in song form. He knows what hits, kind of. Later down the line, he catches up with an old friend. Only having a deep change in his personality. Only getting him deeper into the abyss.

get it?

What's The Features?

  • A rich story, with an open world to explore. Multiple side stories with an opportunity to learn more about the world, and character around you. Take a break from the story and play a select few of mini-games around the town.

Why explore? The town is filled with fun things to do, so why not find out yourself and go explore? It's all in the journey to come.

  • Unique characters, with a different path depending on your choice.

Please, be mindful of the choices you pick. There are some paths that you can't go back on!

  • The world is all 3D, with lovely lighting. While the characters, some items are all 2D. It's a 2.5D game, baby!

That's right, this world is lovely. There will be a lot of things going on in this world, too. What does this mean? Y"know, the basic birds, and animals, people... It'll be living! It won't be empty, just know this for sure! For a lovely world, it must be active!

  • The guitar guides you, let the music flow inside!

Unique songs, and unique battles against NPCs with your guitar! The music Frei plays can change the environment and interact with the environment!

Join The Discord! Follow Development!

Please, feel free to join the Discord and make it active by asking questions, and following development. Please refer to announcements for more news!

content_descriptors.notes:
Please note, this game features many mentions of multiple mental illnesses, triggers, suicide, and multiple things that could be harmful to the player. 

Please be aware.
